verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm reborn
Saved by Your sacrifice
Raised into new-found life
Washed from my sin

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As I wait
Quietly before Your sight
Your nature overwrites
All that I've been

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Write on our hearts
Author of our faith
Finish each part
Seal us by Your grace

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Take our lives, holy and pleasing
A living offering
Given to You, for Your glory
This is Christ, now and forever
Real life together
Joined by the power of the cross in us

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
God, be with us
O Emmanuel
Reign in this place
O Emmanuel
